rows.label: tev000811_MSG0010
rows.name:
Heya, pard. Things're gettin' a bit gnarly
round these parts, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000811_MSG0020
rows.name:
Y'know, you and me, we're the toughest
hombres Mira's got right now. 'Bout time
we put ourselves through our paces, no?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000811_MSG0050
rows.name:
Ha ha ha, that's the spirit!
C'mon then, let's ride out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000811_MSG0080
rows.name:
Seriously? Ah, well.
There's always next time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000811_MSG0100
rows.name:
No surprise there! They wouldn't have
chosen us for the raiding party if a thing
like this could've slowed us down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000811_MSG0110
rows.name:
But that's the last dirty trick
I let that weasel pull. C'mon, pard.
Time to finish the job.[ST:wait ]
